wikipedia_page.main: Francis David Charteris, 12th Earl of Wemyss and 8th Earl of March   (19 January 1912 – 12 December 2008), styled Lord Elcho from 1916 to 1937, was a Scottish peer, landowner and conservationist. From 1946 to 1991, he served as chairman of the board and then president of the National Trust for Scotland.
